name: Skirmish In The City
description:
Use your mouse to aim, take hostage and fire.

Use your keyboard for additional actions:

  • R - reload your weapon
  • E - release the hostage
  • Esc - pause the game

You're a vigilante taking care of some business. Make it to the other side and you will win. You can do anything in order to achieve it: take hostages, shoot enemies, explode.

This is more of the concept game, trying out some ideas and mechanics. Your feedback is highly appreciated!
